files.description: Implements a deterministic, seed-controlled toy experiment that writes ./outputs/results.json with a fixed schema and ./outputs/figure.png using fully deterministic plotting settings.
Pipeline entrypoint that invokes the toy experiment module and ensures the required artifacts are generated under ./outputs with reproducible behavior.
End-to-end test that runs the toy experiment and asserts results.json schema/seeded values plus figure.png determinism via stable file hash or pixel checks.
CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs the test suite, and verifies the pipeline generates deterministic outputs for continuous integration.

missionDescription: Implement/verify a toy experiment script that always writes `./outputs/results.json` (fixed schema, seeded values) and `./outputs/figure.png` (deterministic plot settings), and call it from `scripts/run_pipeline.py`.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Defines the minimal runnable deliverable: a deterministic script that writes `results.json` and `figure.png`, satisfying the computational skeleton requirement and providing concrete execution outputs...
